data.text: @poppoIIs And on top of all that they have the audacity to act like they're doing it so much better than the first time around. You know the one that went on for 8 years.. I guarantee this show gets cancelled after season 2 tops. Unless they somehow get SOMEONE from the original cast.

@poppoIIs Yeah and it has not one person from the original cast. They didnt even involve ANY of the cast or producers in the writing or even the base of the show. They stole an idea of a world someone else came up with and other people brought to life.
@poppoIIs Will it ft the OG cast
